name: Watopia
description:
In Watopia, you are James, a guy who becomes whatever he eats, in this 2D platformer you'll have to use this power to go through all the levels.

Meet the watermelon, a big slow watermelon who crushes whoever is under him,the Avocado, a really annoying enemy who will shoot his seed if you get to close! The tomato, a little, crazy and fast tomato who will run towards you and explode if you stand in front of him, the prickly pear, a spiky buddy who will deal damage to whoever will get too close!

This game was made for the Dani's Basement Jam in 5 days

Note: this is my first ever Game Jam and also first game! So be gentle with me thanks!
